thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com | 3 of 85
thread.title: Jessica Tran

author: Jessica Tran
title: Jessica Tran
text: I have never done evites before and greenenvelope definitely made the experience a great one ! I was actually doing evites because I am throwing my sister-in-law and brother a baby shower. I thought evites would be the best economically friendly way to send out invitations. Green envelopes was fast, easy, and user-friendly. I am not tech savvy at all and this was a great first experience. They also have such cute evites !! There are so many to choose from! I would definitely recommend them to anyone interested in evites.
